inventory.commentary: Contains duplicate WN mappings for WN1.

sense.name: Calm psychologically or metaphorically.
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] STILL NP2[patient[abstract]] NP1[stimulus] STILL NP2[patient[abstract]]
sense.examples: His efforts stilled the 'dragons' of worry and fear. The news stilled my conscience, if only for a moment. We must still the fears that beat in the hearts of every American. The legislation stilled every mechanism of economic growth.

sense.name: Physically still either a whole entity or a part of a whole entity.
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] STILL NP2[patient[concrete]] NP1[stimulus] STILL NP2[patient[concrete]]
sense.examples: Please still your children in the church! They should not speak! The loss stilled his heart and he died. Still your hands - your nervous habits are killing me! He still the puck and readied himself for the offensive.
